name: Gym Class!
description:
Can you reach the end without hitting the obstacles?
There are various moves that you have to do in each level. 
Have fun with the sling but watch out the balance part!
developers: YAMY STUDIO YAZILIM VE OYUN GELISTIRME ANONIM SIRKETI
publishers: YAMY STUDIO YAZILIM VE OYUN GELISTIRME ANONIM SIRKETI
